GOD.content: ethical must sometimes be refused in name of responsibility that doesn’t calculate, that keeps its secret, that tyrannically [Nietzsche], jealously refuses violence of accounts and justifications, declining autobiography that is auto-justification: egodicée
GOD.linkedContent: ethical must sometimes be refused in name of responsibility that doesn’t calculate, that keeps its secret, that tyrannically [Nietzsche], jealously refuses violence of accounts and justifications, declining autobiography that is auto-justification: egodicée

GT.content: the supposedly most personal, direct writing, in contact w/ “thing-itself,” is “on credit”
GT.linkedContent: the supposedly most personal, direct writing, in contact w/ “thing-itself,” is “on credit”

MONL.content: surging wave [déferlment déchainé] of anamnesia that the double interdict unleashed > invent one’s language and “I” at the same time [see p. 70 on autobiography]
MONL.linkedContent: surging wave [déferlment déchainé] of anamnesia that the double interdict unleashed > invent one’s language and “I” at the same time [see p. 70 on autobiography]

POO.content: use of “I” as an example, am I writing an autobiography? or writing about “I” in general, where I become exemplary
POO.linkedContent: use of “I” as an example, am I writing an autobiography? or writing about “I” in general, where I become exemplary

HASD.content: most “autobiographical” [attach as many quotation marks around this word as possible] to leave out Jew & Arab, which Derrida has never been able to speak about [see p. 58]
HASD.linkedContent: most “autobiographical” [attach as many quotation marks around this word as possible] to leave out Jew & Arab, which Derrida has never been able to speak about [see p. 58]

MPM.content: de Man: autobiography is “a figure of reading…that occurs in all texts”
MPM.linkedContent: de Man: autobiography is “a figure of reading…that occurs in all texts”

MPM.content: tropology of memory in autobiographical discourse > discourse as epitaph, signature of its own epitaph (prosopopeia)
MPM.linkedContent: tropology of memory in autobiographical discourse > discourse as epitaph, signature of its own epitaph (prosopopeia)

MPM.content: de Man: prosopon poiein, to confer a mask or face, “prosopopoeia is the trope of autobiography…by which one’s name…is made memorable as a face” > (dis)figuration
MPM.linkedContent: de Man: prosopon poiein, to confer a mask or face, “prosopopoeia is the trope of autobiography…by which one’s name…is made memorable as a face” > (dis)figuration

MPM.content: Paul de Man translates Hegel’s “Ich kann nicht sagen was ich (nur) meine” as ‘I cannot say I’ > effacing of I, a priori functional forgetting > “Autobiography as De-facement”
MPM.linkedContent: Paul de Man translates Hegel’s “Ich kann nicht sagen was ich (nur) meine” as ‘I cannot say I’ > effacing of I, a priori functional forgetting > “Autobiography as De-facement”

A.content: whenever someone speaks of someone else, cites or praises him or her, one must hear: this is the story of my life [re: Diderot accusing Seneca, pardoning Seneca, asking for pardon himself]
A.linkedContent: whenever someone speaks of someone else, cites or praises him or her, one must hear: this is the story of my life [re: Diderot accusing Seneca, pardoning Seneca, asking for pardon himself]

WM.content: [re: Idea in Plato, Hegel] Derrida critiques model of systematic structures perfectly closed over their technical/synchronic manipulation (bodies of work identified acc. “proper name" of signature)
WM.linkedContent: [re: Idea in Plato, Hegel] Derrida critiques model of systematic structures perfectly closed over their technical/synchronic manipulation (bodies of work identified acc. “proper name" of signature)

OTO.content: discourse on life/death occurs btwn logos and gramme, analogy & program, program & reproduction (since life is on the line, the trait [splitting of line] relating graphical to logical, also working btwn biological & biographical, thanatological & thanatographical)
OTO.linkedContent: discourse on life/death occurs btwn logos and gramme, analogy & program, program & reproduction (since life is on the line, the trait [splitting of line] relating graphical to logical, also working btwn biological & biographical, thanatological & thanatographical)

OTO.content: biographical novels of a philosopher don’t analyze signature & proper name (the demands of a text), the dynamis of the borderline btwn “work” & “life”
OTO.linkedContent: biographical novels of a philosopher don’t analyze signature & proper name (the demands of a text), the dynamis of the borderline btwn “work” & “life”

OTO.content: painfully difficult for life to become object of science, would require a philosophy of life, a whole politics, which inscribes the bio-graphical w/in the bio-logical
OTO.linkedContent: painfully difficult for life to become object of science, would require a philosophy of life, a whole politics, which inscribes the bio-graphical w/in the bio-logical

OTO.content: F.N. already a pseudonym, be immeasurably wary when we think we’re reading Nietzsche’s signature or “autograph”
OTO.linkedContent: F.N. already a pseudonym, be immeasurably wary when we think we’re reading Nietzsche’s signature or “autograph”

OTO.content: Nietzsche never knows if anyone will honor the inordinate credit he grants himself in his name, & in the name of the other; autobiography as secret contract (annulus), encrypted credit account: for Nietzsche, his life, the “I-live,” is perhaps mere prejudice (Vorurteil)
OTO.linkedContent: Nietzsche never knows if anyone will honor the inordinate credit he grants himself in his name, & in the name of the other; autobiography as secret contract (annulus), encrypted credit account: for Nietzsche, his life, the “I-live,” is perhaps mere prejudice (Vorurteil)

OTO.content: autobiography: life he lives and tells to himself

autobiographical récit, tells himself his life, affirms EROS, gratitude for gift (gift: establishment of my own credit w/ this name): EROS signs or seals > before such signature, my life may be mere prejudice
OTO.linkedContent: autobiographical récit, tells himself his life, affirms EROS, gratitude for gift (gift: establishment of my own credit w/ this name): EROS signs or seals > before such signature, my life may be mere prejudice

OTO.content: autobiography’s signature written in step not beyond, Nietzsche’s one foot beyond life: differance, allo-, thanatography of autobiography
OTO.linkedContent: autobiography’s signature written in step not beyond, Nietzsche’s one foot beyond life: differance, allo-, thanatography of autobiography

ATIA.content: Sarah Kofman’s Autobiogriffures sits vigil over conference
ATIA.linkedContent: Sarah Kofman’s Autobiogriffures sits vigil over conference

ATIA.content: autobiography (before the fall), confession (after the fall); autobiography becomes confession when it cannot separate itself from a fault, ill, evil (a debt that needs to be paid off); to pay off truth [but we name animals before the fall, is that possible?]
ATIA.linkedContent: autobiography (before the fall), confession (after the fall); autobiography becomes confession when it cannot separate itself from a fault, ill, evil (a debt that needs to be paid off); to pay off truth [but we name animals before the fall, is that possible?]

ATIA.content: why would we owe truth anything? the debt of autobiography: confession > after the fall, must already conceive lying as evil, as hiding truth
ATIA.linkedContent: why would we owe truth anything? the debt of autobiography: confession > after the fall, must already conceive lying as evil, as hiding truth

ATIA.content: history, historicity, historicality, all part of auto-biography, auto-definition, auto-situation of man [re: Derrida’s hesitation to claim there’s been a historical turning point in relation btwn man and animal, figure of turning pout too genetic, biological, zoological]
ATIA.linkedContent: history, historicity, historicality, all part of auto-biography, auto-definition, auto-situation of man [re: Derrida’s hesitation to claim there’s been a historical turning point in relation btwn man and animal, figure of turning pout too genetic, biological, zoological]

ATIA.content: anthropo-centric subjectivity speaks only from one edge of Man/Animal limit, gives autobiography, history of its life, that it therefore calls History
ATIA.linkedContent: anthropo-centric subjectivity speaks only from one edge of Man/Animal limit, gives autobiography, history of its life, that it therefore calls History

ATIA.content: Derrida introduces what will be his zootobiography, zoo-auto-bio-bibilio-graphy, not the otobiography you can find in Nietzsche [will indulge before discussing history of “I am”]
ATIA.linkedContent: Derrida introduces what will be his zootobiography, zoo-auto-bio-bibilio-graphy, not the otobiography you can find in Nietzsche [will indulge before discussing history of “I am”]

ATIA.content: [quoting PP] contours of anthropos determined by zoopharmaceutical ambivalence [re: the demonic as bestiary] > Socrates is compared to gadfly, his pharmakon like torpedo fish, but he’s still an “autobiographic animal”
ATIA.linkedContent: [quoting PP] contours of anthropos determined by zoopharmaceutical ambivalence [re: the demonic as bestiary] > Socrates is compared to gadfly, his pharmakon like torpedo fish, but he’s still an “autobiographic animal”

ATIA.content: Bellerophon’s modesty, shame before the immodest women saves the city, this immunizing drive, Heidegger’s Verhaltenheit, restraint, is the origin of the religious, of the immune, sacred (heilig), holy, separate (kadosh) [it also can be perverted: auto-immunity; virtual, analogical relation btwn auto-biography & auto-immunity]
ATIA.linkedContent: Bellerophon’s modesty, shame before the immodest women saves the city, this immunizing drive, Heidegger’s Verhaltenheit, restraint, is the origin of the religious, of the immune, sacred (heilig), holy, separate (kadosh) [it also can be perverted: auto-immunity; virtual, analogical relation btwn auto-biography & auto-immunity]

ATIA.content: autobiography, writing of self as living, trace of the living for itself, auto-affection or auto-infection as memory/archive of living, an immunization, making holy, virginal, indemnify; every autos, ipseity, threatened w/ auto-immunity, the poison of the auto-biography
ATIA.linkedContent: autobiography, writing of self as living, trace of the living for itself, auto-affection or auto-infection as memory/archive of living, an immunization, making holy, virginal, indemnify; every autos, ipseity, threatened w/ auto-immunity, the poison of the auto-biography

ATIA.content: “autobiographical animals”: Proust, Gide, Woolf, Stein, Celan, Bataille, Genet, Duras, Cixous, Augustine
ATIA.linkedContent: “autobiographical animals”: Proust, Gide, Woolf, Stein, Celan, Bataille, Genet, Duras, Cixous, Augustine

ATIA.content: autobiograparaphing: affect w/ traces of a living self [both man and animals?]
ATIA.linkedContent: autobiograparaphing: affect w/ traces of a living self [both man and animals?]

ATIA.content: “I” speaks to “engage nudity w/out shame,” untenable pledge > bring in a mirror (une psyché), is the animal caught there too? or my primary mirror?
ATIA.linkedContent: “I” speaks to “engage nudity w/out shame,” untenable pledge > bring in a mirror (une psyché), is the animal caught there too? or my primary mirror?

ATIA.content: every response to “who am I?” is only something I can answer, auto-biography, but it’s also quotation, an aping, miming [idiom & inheritance]
ATIA.linkedContent: every response to “who am I?” is only something I can answer, auto-biography, but it’s also quotation, an aping, miming [idiom & inheritance]

ATIA.content: “I,” the autos, ipseity, as a promise, guarantee (gage) or undertaking (engagement), of discourse on auto-biographical method, sign/manifestation of life in presence, even if from an animal, machine, living or dead > “I am dead” in some way implied in every cogito ergo sum
ATIA.linkedContent: “I,” the autos, ipseity, as a promise, guarantee (gage) or undertaking (engagement), of discourse on auto-biographical method, sign/manifestation of life in presence, even if from an animal, machine, living or dead > “I am dead” in some way implied in every cogito ergo sum

ATIA.content: institutional sanction of “autobiography,” sense of pure autobiography, discharges onus of proof, artificial authority of genre, provides scene of witnessing to “naked and raw” “I”
ATIA.linkedContent: institutional sanction of “autobiography,” sense of pure autobiography, discharges onus of proof, artificial authority of genre, provides scene of witnessing to “naked and raw” “I”

ATIA.content: autobiography begins when there is a (female) witness, an animal, a mirror [?]
ATIA.linkedContent: autobiography begins when there is a (female) witness, an animal, a mirror [?]

ATIA.content: “I,” ipseity, auto-affection, automotion, autokinesis, autonomy, sui-referential egoity (recognized in every animal): genesis of zootobiography [“I” w/out “I am”]
ATIA.linkedContent: “I,” ipseity, auto-affection, automotion, autokinesis, autonomy, sui-referential egoity (recognized in every animal): genesis of zootobiography [“I” w/out “I am”]

ATIA.content: Valéry’s snake utters the first word (of Verb): “ME,” this “I am that I am,” first impurity, contamination of being, ontological creation, autobiographogenesis, becomes words of seducer > promise to breach purity of nothingness w/ performative
ATIA.linkedContent: Valéry’s snake utters the first word (of Verb): “ME,” this “I am that I am,” first impurity, contamination of being, ontological creation, autobiographogenesis, becomes words of seducer > promise to breach purity of nothingness w/ performative

ATIA.content: I am HE,” auto-zoo-theo-morphic > snake as God, divinity diminished by fires of Seducer
ATIA.linkedContent: I am HE,” auto-zoo-theo-morphic > snake as God, divinity diminished by fires of Seducer

ATIA.content: Descartes writes in French (autobiographilosophical narrative, for which he paved the way) to make accessible to “natural reason” and to “women”
ATIA.linkedContent: Descartes writes in French (autobiographilosophical narrative, for which he paved the way) to make accessible to “natural reason” and to “women”

ATIA.content: all autobiography presents itself as testimony, every testimony presents itself as autobiographical truth
ATIA.linkedContent: all autobiography presents itself as testimony, every testimony presents itself as autobiographical truth

ATIA.content: single embrace of Kant, Descartes, Levinas, Lacan, Heidegger, like chasing, hunting, trying to take hold of cuttlefish, touch the animal in a way where it will expel its ink (encre), its anchor, in this case, w/ these folks, the ink as the ability to do the “I,” before autoreference; (in the name of autobiography) Derrida confides the animalist “vision” he has of what he does, what he writes > his “sole concern” is to not sacrifice to it any difference, fold, opening to-come
ATIA.linkedContent: single embrace of Kant, Descartes, Levinas, Lacan, Heidegger, like chasing, hunting, trying to take hold of cuttlefish, touch the animal in a way where it will expel its ink (encre), its anchor, in this case, w/ these folks, the ink as the ability to do the “I,” before autoreference; (in the name of autobiography) Derrida confides the animalist “vision” he has of what he does, what he writes > his “sole concern” is to not sacrifice to it any difference, fold, opening to-come

ATIA.content: for Kant, “dignity” of man, his autonomy, his autotely, his capacity for moral autodestination (Selbstbestimmung), for moral autobiography > this is his privilege, assures Herrschaft
ATIA.linkedContent: for Kant, “dignity” of man, his autonomy, his autotely, his capacity for moral autodestination (Selbstbestimmung), for moral autobiography > this is his privilege, assures Herrschaft

ATIA.content: in similar ways, Descartes, Levinas, Heidegger, Kant privilege “Here I am” over existence of life; for Levinas, w/out separation, possibility of responding, animals don’t die, can thus be put to death w/out being killed
ATIA.linkedContent: in similar ways, Descartes, Levinas, Heidegger, Kant privilege “Here I am” over existence of life; for Levinas, w/out separation, possibility of responding, animals don’t die, can thus be put to death w/out being killed

ATIA.content: responsibility of one who says “here I am” is Levinas’ first inspiration for his “first philosophy”; it is autodeictic, autobiographical: 1) exposing oneself before the law 2) ability to respond to an appeal or command of the other
ATIA.linkedContent: responsibility of one who says “here I am” is Levinas’ first inspiration for his “first philosophy”; it is autodeictic, autobiographical: 1) exposing oneself before the law 2) ability to respond to an appeal or command of the other

ATIA.content: secondariness of “I am living” to “I think,” unthought side of a thinking of life, a “living present”: thus began deconstruction, w/ Husserl & everything that followed, questioning autobiography of ego in its living present
ATIA.linkedContent: secondariness of “I am living” to “I think,” unthought side of a thinking of life, a “living present”: thus began deconstruction, w/ Husserl & everything that followed, questioning autobiography of ego in its living present

ATIA.content: for Lacan, animal cannot accede to symbolic, unconscious, language (to autobiographical auto-deixis)
ATIA.linkedContent: for Lacan, animal cannot accede to symbolic, unconscious, language (to autobiographical auto-deixis)

ATIA.content: [can man attribute to himself indivisible concept of being able to feign a feint? “subject of the signifier”] do we have to remind a psychoanalysis that erasure of a trace can ensure its return? sense the virtual consequences on our subject: autobiography
ATIA.linkedContent: [can man attribute to himself indivisible concept of being able to feign a feint? “subject of the signifier”] do we have to remind a psychoanalysis that erasure of a trace can ensure its return? sense the virtual consequences on our subject: autobiography

SW.content: philosophy of nature, for the child I still am, was naivety itself, but also time of infinite apprenticeship, culture made up acc. fiction, the autobiography of lure (Dichtung und Wahrheit), beginning to write a novel of sericulture
SW.linkedContent: philosophy of nature, for the child I still am, was naivety itself, but also time of infinite apprenticeship, culture made up acc. fiction, the autobiography of lure (Dichtung und Wahrheit), beginning to write a novel of sericulture

DST.content: for Lacoue-Labarthe [?], anyone linked to edge of madness (au bord de la folie), the autobiographical (allobiographical) adventure, and its doubles, and the other, and death, is concerned w/ rhythm (the musical obsession) (Nietzsche, Hölderlin, Rousseau, Reik, Mallarmé)
DST.linkedContent: for Lacoue-Labarthe [?], anyone linked to edge of madness (au bord de la folie), the autobiographical (allobiographical) adventure, and its doubles, and the other, and death, is concerned w/ rhythm (the musical obsession) (Nietzsche, Hölderlin, Rousseau, Reik, Mallarmé)

PIO.content: Leibniz’s call for a genre that could be called: “an inventor’s autobiographical memoirs”
PIO.linkedContent: Leibniz’s call for a genre that could be called: “an inventor’s autobiographical memoirs”

TR.content: de Man: deconstruction of figural dimension threatens autobiographical subject
TR.linkedContent: de Man: deconstruction of figural dimension threatens autobiographical subject

EL.content: “we” of covenant, not secularized “communal subject,” countersigns by responding to commitment already taken: autobiographicity of “we” assigned by call resonating from sacred language > in sacrificial instant, one hears imminence of God’s voice’s return
EL.linkedContent: “we” of covenant, not secularized “communal subject,” countersigns by responding to commitment already taken: autobiographicity of “we” assigned by call resonating from sacred language > in sacrificial instant, one hears imminence of God’s voice’s return

C.content: cartouche: puts itself to work, forms part of the work by inscribing (itself) (as) the title, signature, autobiographical performative of the signatory
C.linkedContent: cartouche: puts itself to work, forms part of the work by inscribing (itself) (as) the title, signature, autobiographical performative of the signatory

TN.content: for Psyche, for a psyche altogether exposed to outside & other, there’s no autobiography: mourning autobiography (not just any mourning)
TN.linkedContent: for Psyche, for a psyche altogether exposed to outside & other, there’s no autobiography: mourning autobiography (not just any mourning)

TN.content: being unimaginable gives rise to phantasms, allegories, figures, metonymies: technics > no overcoming (surmonté) this mourning w/out mourning [of autobiography] by any "work of mourning”
TN.linkedContent: being unimaginable gives rise to phantasms, allegories, figures, metonymies: technics > no overcoming (surmonté) this mourning w/out mourning [of autobiography] by any "work of mourning”

TN.content: when Nancy gives thought to birth of body, it’s sarcastic [having it out w/ flesh], mordant, une transsubstantiation acharnée qui inlassablement mord, remord et met à mort la chair > impossible auto-biography, transubstantiation of Eucharist itself: Corpus bursts out laughing
TN.linkedContent: when Nancy gives thought to birth of body, it’s sarcastic [having it out w/ flesh], mordant, une transsubstantiation acharnée qui inlassablement mord, remord et met à mort la chair > impossible auto-biography, transubstantiation of Eucharist itself: Corpus bursts out laughing

CIR.content: literary confessions, form of theology as autobiography

ci, scie, ciseaux, si, ceci (enormous narcissistic monument), on the ci of circumcision is gathered the interrupted autobiothanatoheterographical opus; never known how to love save in the place of a figure unknown to me
CIR.linkedContent: ci, scie, ciseaux, si, ceci (enormous narcissistic monument), on the ci of circumcision is gathered the interrupted autobiothanatoheterographical opus; never known how to love save in the place of a figure unknown to me

CIR.content: recount the “present,” throw G. off course, the present you are making him: Everybody’s Autobiography
CIR.linkedContent: recount the “present,” throw G. off course, the present you are making him: Everybody’s Autobiography

EU.content: [re: Derrida’s texts] autobiographical elements were undermining very notion of autobiography > undecidable, baffling (déroutant)
EU.linkedContent: [re: Derrida’s texts] autobiographical elements were undermining very notion of autobiography > undecidable, baffling (déroutant)

SPEC.content: Freud’s empirical, biographical excuse for speculation [in Beyond…, recurrence of malignant disease] doesn’t get us far > because of parergonal supplement: autobiography becomes heterothanatographical, bios—croiser l’autre, se croiser avec l’autre
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud’s empirical, biographical excuse for speculation [in Beyond…, recurrence of malignant disease] doesn’t get us far > because of parergonal supplement: autobiography becomes heterothanatographical, bios—croiser l’autre, se croiser avec l’autre

SPEC.content: autobiography of Freud as living description of his own writing, as if grandson were dictating to Freud what he had to set down on paper > not just tautological mirror, autobiography of the writing posits/deposits simultaneously—the psychoanalytic movement, elle performe et parie sur ce qui donna la chance [to psychoanalysis] > now Derrida: “je parie" that this double fort/da cooperates in initiating psychoanalysis
SPEC.linkedContent: autobiography of Freud as living description of his own writing, as if grandson were dictating to Freud what he had to set down on paper > not just tautological mirror, autobiography of the writing posits/deposits simultaneously—the psychoanalytic movement, elle performe et parie sur ce qui donna la chance [to psychoanalysis] > now Derrida: “je parie" that this double fort/da cooperates in initiating psychoanalysis

SPEC.content: how can [Freud’s] autobiography give a worldwide (mondiale) institution its birth? what is autobiography if everything that follows from it is possible?
SPEC.linkedContent: how can [Freud’s] autobiography give a worldwide (mondiale) institution its birth? what is autobiography if everything that follows from it is possible?

SPEC.content: speculator can survive legatee of an autobiographical speculation, institution of movement w/out limit: mutism/death of legatee, one of the possibilities that dictates/causes legatee to write
SPEC.linkedContent: speculator can survive legatee of an autobiographical speculation, institution of movement w/out limit: mutism/death of legatee, one of the possibilities that dictates/causes legatee to write

SPEC.content: one gives oneself one’s own movement, one inherits from oneself all the time
SPEC.linkedContent: one gives oneself one’s own movement, one inherits from oneself all the time

SPEC.content: sufficient provisions so ghost can always step up to the cashier (passer à la caisse); all that’s necessary is to pronounce a name guaranteeing a signature, one thinks
SPEC.linkedContent: sufficient provisions so ghost can always step up to the cashier (passer à la caisse); all that’s necessary is to pronounce a name guaranteeing a signature, one thinks

SPEC.content: [given Freud’s “new” genre] new distinction btwn narrator’s “I” and author’s “I”
SPEC.linkedContent: [given Freud’s “new” genre] new distinction btwn narrator’s “I” and author’s “I”

SPEC.content: inscription of a subject in his [Freud’s] text is also condition of the performance/pertinence of a text, beyond empirical subjectivity, supposing that could exist as soon as one writes, substitutes, supplements: notion of truth incapable of accounting for this performance
SPEC.linkedContent: inscription of a subject in his [Freud’s] text is also condition of the performance/pertinence of a text, beyond empirical subjectivity, supposing that could exist as soon as one writes, substitutes, supplements: notion of truth incapable of accounting for this performance

SPEC.content: autobiographics of Beyond…, of word beyond [common name], imprints a prescription on fort:da, an overlapping (rapporté) by means of which proximity distances itself en abyme (Ent-fernung)
SPEC.linkedContent: autobiographics of Beyond…, of word beyond [common name], imprints a prescription on fort:da, an overlapping (rapporté) by means of which proximity distances itself en abyme (Ent-fernung)

SPEC.content: fort:da: leads autobiographical specularity into an autothanatography that’s in advance expropriated into heterography
SPEC.linkedContent: fort:da: leads autobiographical specularity into an autothanatography that’s in advance expropriated into heterography

SPEC.content: usteron proteron, “preceding falsehood” of generations, when figure w/out figure, name w/out name, of the mother returns: this is the logic of obsequence (Glas) > la mère enterre tous les siens
SPEC.linkedContent: usteron proteron, “preceding falsehood” of generations, when figure w/out figure, name w/out name, of the mother returns: this is the logic of obsequence (Glas) > la mère enterre tous les siens

SPEC.content: that which entraps speculation: murderous, mournful, jealous, guilty identifications [re: Freud’s relation to death of his & Ernst’s younger brother] > rigorous stricture, legacy & jealousy of a repetition (already jealous of itself) pull its [fort:da’s] strings (tirent les fils) more or less strictly > scene of writing becomes auto-bio-thanato-hetero-graphic
SPEC.linkedContent: that which entraps speculation: murderous, mournful, jealous, guilty identifications [re: Freud’s relation to death of his & Ernst’s younger brother] > rigorous stricture, legacy & jealousy of a repetition (already jealous of itself) pull its [fort:da’s] strings (tirent les fils) more or less strictly > scene of writing becomes auto-bio-thanato-hetero-graphic
